sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,A.LINE_BIZ_TP_DESC_TXT LINE_BIZ_TP_DESC_TXT FROM LINE_BIZ_TP A ,AVAL_LINE_BIZ_TP_SRC B WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = B.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND A.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD = B.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD AND B.SYS_SRC_CD = #sysSrcCd# AND B.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.LINE_BIZ_TP_SORT_NUM
